claim: The number of gold-eyed superheroes associated with Marvel Comics is 2.
extra_info: gold-eyed refers to colour = 'Gold' where eye_colour_id = colour.id; superheroes that Marvel Comics published refers to publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics'
reasoning: The query joining superhero, colour, and publisher tables with conditions colour='Gold' and publisher_name='Marvel Comics' returns a count of 2, which matches the claim exactly.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE superhero
(
    id             INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    superhero_name TEXT default NULL,
    full_name      TEXT default NULL,
    gender_id      INTEGER          default NULL,
    eye_colour_id  INTEGER          default NULL,
    hair_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    skin_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    race_id        INTEGER          default NULL,
    publisher_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    alignment_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    height_cm      INTEGER          default NULL,
    weight_kg      INTEGER          default NULL,
    foreign key (alignment_id) references alignment(id),
    foreign key (eye_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (gender_id) references gender(id),
    foreign key (hair_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (publisher_id) references publisher(id),
    foreign key (race_id) references race(id),
    foreign key (skin_colour_id) references colour(id)
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE superhero
(
    id             INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    superhero_name TEXT default NULL,
    full_name      TEXT default NULL,
    gender_id      INTEGER          default NULL,
    eye_colour_id  INTEGER          default NULL,
    hair_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    skin_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    race_id        INTEGER          default NULL,
    publisher_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    alignment_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    height_cm      INTEGER          default NULL,
    weight_kg      INTEGER          default NULL,
    foreign key (alignment_id) references alignment(id),
    foreign key (eye_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (gender_id) references gender(id),
    foreign key (hair_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (publisher_id) references publisher(id),
    foreign key (race_id) references race(id),
    foreign key (skin_colour_id) references colour(id)
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/superhero.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM superhero s JOIN colour c ON s.eye_colour_id = c.id JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id WHERE c.colour = 'Gold' AND p.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics';"
